thread.section_title: KeepCalling.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of KeepCalling.com | keepcalling.com | 4 of 81
thread.title: Sonia Morr

author: Sonia Morr
title: Sonia Morr
text: I've been using KeepCalling for few years now and have recommended it to many friends. It is always a peace of mind when you don't worry about running out of voice credit. I have family in 3 different countries and we talk almost every week and sometimes more than few times per week. The connection/reception is great and it never lets me down. And their customer service staff are so efficient! I had to call them once and the response and help were amazing! I don't know what I would do without KeepCalling. Thank you so much for making life easier.
